translations: 芋泥；用芋头做成的食品

sentences.sentence: Mobile POI Search has become one of the main applications in Mobile Search.
sentences.translation: 手机POI搜索已经成为手机搜索的主要应用之一。

sentences.sentence: This article uses the Apache POI because of its support community and rich functionality.
sentences.translation: 由于 Apache POI 的支持社区和丰富功能，本文使用 Apache POI。

sentences.sentence: The first step in reading an Excel workbook is to prepare to use the Apache POI and other necessary classes.
sentences.translation: 读取Excel工作簿的第一步是准备使用Apache POI和其他必要的类。
